statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (6,-3) and (12,10).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{10}-{\left(-{3}\right)}}}{{{12}-{\left({6}\right)}}}=\frac{{13}}{{6}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{13}}{{6}} (if it's not already reduced)
